languages.text: {n}Грациозный танец мехадендритов обретает более хаотичный, непредсказуемый рисунок.{/n} "Я склоняюсь к мысли, что Эсхатос должен существовать. Но не в руках Коллектива Амарнат. Лишь в моих".

{n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Грациозный танец мехадендритов обретает более хаотичный, непредсказуемый рисунок.{/n} "Я склоняюсь к мысли, что Эсхатос должен существовать. Но не в руках Коллектива Амарнат. Лишь в моих".

traits.locale_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}機械触手の優雅な踊りはさらに秩序を失い、予測不能な動きとなる。{/n}「エスカトは存続しなくてはならないと考えつつある。だが、アマルナト集合体の管理下においてはならない。自分ひとりで管理する」
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手の優雅な踊りはさらに秩序を失い、予測不能な動きとなる。{/n}「エスカトは存続しなくてはならないと考えつつある。だが、アマルナト集合体の管理下においてはならない。自分ひとりで管理する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}机械触须的优雅舞蹈变得更加混乱，不可预测。{/n}“我倾向认为，终焉审判必须存在，但不是在阿玛纳特聚合意识手中，而是在我个人手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}机械触须的优雅舞蹈变得更加混乱，不可预测。{/n}“我倾向认为，终焉审判必须存在，但不是在阿玛纳特聚合意识手中，而是在我个人手中。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La danse jusque-là gracieuse des mécadendrites se fait plus chaotique et imprévisible.{/n} « Je pense qu'Eschatos doit exister. Mais pas sous le contrôle du collectif Amarnat. Sous le mien uniquement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}La danse jusque-là gracieuse des mécadendrites se fait plus chaotique et imprévisible.{/n} « Je pense qu'Eschatos doit exister. Mais pas sous le contrôle du collectif Amarnat. Sous le mien uniquement. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La elegante danza de sus mecadendritas realiza un patrón aún más caótico e impredecible.{/n} «Me inclino hacia la idea de que Eschatos debe existir, pero no servir al Colectivo Amarnat, sino solo a mí».
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}La elegante danza de sus mecadendritas realiza un patrón aún más caótico e impredecible.{/n} «Me inclino hacia la idea de que Eschatos debe existir, pero no servir al Colectivo Amarnat, sino solo a mí».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der elegante Tanz der Mechadendriten nimmt ein chaotischeres, weniger berechenbares Muster an.{/n} "Ich tendiere zu dem Gedanken, dass Eschatos existieren muss. Jedoch nicht in den Händen des Amarnat-Kollektivs. Sondern allein in den meinen."
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der elegante Tanz der Mechadendriten nimmt ein chaotischeres, weniger berechenbares Muster an.{/n} "Ich tendiere zu dem Gedanken, dass Eschatos existieren muss. Jedoch nicht in den Händen des Amarnat-Kollektivs. Sondern allein in den meinen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mekadentritlerin zarif dansı, yerini daha kaotik ve ön görülemez bir motife bırakıyor.{/n} "Eskatos'un var olmak zorunda olduğu fikrine meylediyorum. Bu kararı Amarnat Bütünlüğü veremez. Sadece ben verebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more chaotic and unpredictable pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos must exist. But not in the hands of the Amarnat Collective. In mine alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekadentritlerin zarif dansı, yerini daha kaotik ve ön görülemez bir motife bırakıyor.{/n} "Eschatos'un var olmak zorunda olduğu fikrine meylediyorum. Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün elinde değil ama. Sadece benim elimde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
